machine_show_variants.label: Show Machine Variants
machine_show_variants.description: Whether to show the different variants of this machine, which are described in separate json files.

machine_start_gcode.label: Start G-code
machine_start_gcode.description: G-code commands to be executed at the very start - separated by \n.
machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G28 ;Home
G1 Z15.0 F6000 ;Move the platform down 15mm
;Prime the extruder
G92 E0
G1 F200 E3
G92 E0

machine_end_gcode.label: End G-code
machine_end_gcode.description: G-code commands to be executed at the very end - separated by \n.
machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0
M140 S0
;Retract the filament
G92 E1
G1 E-1 F300
G28 X0 Y0
M84

material_guid.label: Material GUID
material_guid.description: GUID of the material. This is set automatically.

material_diameter.label: Diameter
material_diameter.description: Adjusts the diameter of the filament used. Match this value with the diameter of the used filament.

material_bed_temp_wait.label: Wait for Build Plate Heatup
material_bed_temp_wait.description: Whether to insert a command to wait until the build plate temperature is reached at the start.

material_print_temp_wait.label: Wait for Nozzle Heatup
material_print_temp_wait.description: Whether to wait until the nozzle temperature is reached at the start.

machine_width.label: Machine Width
machine_width.description: The width (X-direction) of the printable area.

machine_depth.label: Machine Depth
machine_depth.description: The depth (Y-direction) of the printable area.

machine_shape.label: Build Plate Shape
machine_shape.description: The shape of the build plate without taking unprintable areas into account.

machine_buildplate_type.label: Build Plate Material
machine_buildplate_type.description: The material of the build plate installed on the printer.

machine_height.label: Machine Height
machine_height.description: The height (Z-direction) of the printable area.

machine_heated_build_volume.label: Has Build Volume Temperature Stabilization
machine_heated_build_volume.description: Whether the machine is able to stabilize the build volume temperature.

machine_always_write_active_tool.label: Always Write Active Tool
machine_always_write_active_tool.description: Write active tool after sending temp commands to inactive tool. Required for Dual Extruder printing with Smoothie or other firmware with modal tool commands.

machine_center_is_zero.label: Is Center Origin
machine_center_is_zero.description: Whether the X/Y coordinates of the zero position of the printer is at the center of the printable area.

machine_extruder_count.label: Number of Extruders
machine_extruder_count.description: Number of extruder trains. An extruder train is the combination of a feeder, bowden tube, and nozzle.

extruders_enabled_count.label: Number of Extruders That Are Enabled
extruders_enabled_count.description: Number of extruder trains that are enabled; automatically set in software

machine_nozzle_tip_outer_diameter.label: Outer Nozzle Diameter
machine_nozzle_tip_outer_diameter.description: The outer diameter of the tip of the nozzle.

machine_nozzle_head_distance.label: Nozzle Length
machine_nozzle_head_distance.description: The height difference between the tip of the nozzle and the lowest part of the print head.

machine_nozzle_expansion_angle.label: Nozzle Angle
machine_nozzle_expansion_angle.description: The angle between the horizontal plane and the conical part right above the tip of the nozzle.

machine_heat_zone_length.label: Heat Zone Length
machine_heat_zone_length.description: The distance from the tip of the nozzle in which heat from the nozzle is transferred to the filament.

machine_nozzle_temp_enabled.label: Enable Nozzle Temperature Control
machine_nozzle_temp_enabled.description: Whether to control temperature from Cura. Turn this off to control nozzle temperature from outside of Cura.

machine_nozzle_heat_up_speed.label: Heat Up Speed
machine_nozzle_heat_up_speed.description: The speed (°C/s) by which the nozzle heats up averaged over the window of normal printing temperatures and the standby temperature.

machine_nozzle_cool_down_speed.label: Cool Down Speed
machine_nozzle_cool_down_speed.description: The speed (°C/s) by which the nozzle cools down averaged over the window of normal printing temperatures and the standby temperature.

machine_min_cool_heat_time_window.label: Minimal Time Standby Temperature
machine_min_cool_heat_time_window.description: The minimal time an extruder has to be inactive before the nozzle is cooled. Only when an extruder is not used for longer than this time will it be allowed to cool down to the standby temperature.

machine_gcode_flavor.label: G-code Flavor
machine_gcode_flavor.description: The type of g-code to be generated.

machine_firmware_retract.label: Firmware Retraction
machine_firmware_retract.description: Whether to use firmware retract commands (G10/G11) instead of using the E property in G1 commands to retract the material.

machine_extruders_share_heater.label: Extruders Share Heater
machine_extruders_share_heater.description: Whether the extruders share a single heater rather than each extruder having its own heater.

machine_disallowed_areas.label: Disallowed Areas
machine_disallowed_areas.description: A list of polygons with areas the print head is not allowed to enter.

nozzle_disallowed_areas.label: Nozzle Disallowed Areas
nozzle_disallowed_areas.description: A list of polygons with areas the nozzle is not allowed to enter.

machine_head_with_fans_polygon.label: Machine Head & Fan Polygon
machine_head_with_fans_polygon.description: A 2D silhouette of the print head (fan caps included).

gantry_height.label: Gantry Height
gantry_height.description: The height difference between the tip of the nozzle and the gantry system (X and Y axes).

machine_nozzle_id.label: Nozzle ID
machine_nozzle_id.description: The nozzle ID for an extruder train, such as "AA 0.4" and "BB 0.8".

machine_nozzle_size.label: Nozzle Diameter
machine_nozzle_size.description: The inner diameter of the nozzle. Change this setting when using a non-standard nozzle size.

machine_use_extruder_offset_to_offset_co.label: Offset with Extruder
machine_use_extruder_offset_to_offset_co.description: Apply the extruder offset to the coordinate system.

extruder_prime_pos_z.label: Extruder Prime Z Position
extruder_prime_pos_z.description: The Z coordinate of the position where the nozzle primes at the start of printing.

extruder_prime_pos_abs.label: Absolute Extruder Prime Position
extruder_prime_pos_abs.description: Make the extruder prime position absolute rather than relative to the last-known location of the head.

machine_max_feedrate_x.label: Maximum Speed X
machine_max_feedrate_x.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the X-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_y.label: Maximum Speed Y
machine_max_feedrate_y.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the Y-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_z.label: Maximum Speed Z
machine_max_feedrate_z.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_e.label: Maximum Feedrate
machine_max_feedrate_e.description: The maximum speed of the filament.

machine_max_acceleration_x.label: Maximum Acceleration X
machine_max_acceleration_x.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the X-direction

machine_max_acceleration_y.label: Maximum Acceleration Y
machine_max_acceleration_y.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Y-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_z.label: Maximum Acceleration Z
machine_max_acceleration_z.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_e.label: Maximum Filament Acceleration
machine_max_acceleration_e.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the filament.

machine_acceleration.label: Default Acceleration
machine_acceleration.description: The default acceleration of print head movement.

machine_max_jerk_xy.label: Default X-Y Jerk
machine_max_jerk_xy.description: Default jerk for movement in the horizontal plane.

machine_max_jerk_z.label: Default Z Jerk
machine_max_jerk_z.description: Default jerk for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_jerk_e.label: Default Filament Jerk
machine_max_jerk_e.description: Default jerk for the motor of the filament.

machine_steps_per_mm_x.label: Steps per Millimeter (X)
machine_steps_per_mm_x.description: How many steps of the stepper motor will result in one millimeter of movement in the X direction.

machine_steps_per_mm_y.label: Steps per Millimeter (Y)
machine_steps_per_mm_y.description: How many steps of the stepper motor will result in one millimeter of movement in the Y direction.

machine_steps_per_mm_z.label: Steps per Millimeter (Z)
machine_steps_per_mm_z.description: How many steps of the stepper motor will result in one millimeter of movement in the Z direction.

machine_steps_per_mm_e.label: Steps per Millimeter (E)
machine_steps_per_mm_e.description: How many steps of the stepper motors will result in one millimeter of extrusion.

machine_endstop_positive_direction_x.label: X Endstop in Positive Direction
machine_endstop_positive_direction_x.description: Whether the endstop of the X axis is in the positive direction (high X coordinate) or negative (low X coordinate).

machine_endstop_positive_direction_y.label: Y Endstop in Positive Direction
machine_endstop_positive_direction_y.description: Whether the endstop of the Y axis is in the positive direction (high Y coordinate) or negative (low Y coordinate).

machine_endstop_positive_direction_z.label: Z Endstop in Positive Direction
machine_endstop_positive_direction_z.description: Whether the endstop of the Z axis is in the positive direction (high Z coordinate) or negative (low Z coordinate).

machine_minimum_feedrate.label: Minimum Feedrate
machine_minimum_feedrate.description: The minimal movement speed of the print head.

machine_feeder_wheel_diameter.label: Feeder Wheel Diameter
machine_feeder_wheel_diameter.description: The diameter of the wheel that drives the material in the feeder.
